snippet: None of the candidates for speaker will reveal who, if anyone, has pledged to vote for them, making it difficult for insiders to work the voters: their fellow legislators.
lead_paragraph: None of the candidates for speaker will reveal who, if anyone, has pledged to vote for them, making it difficult for insiders to work the voters: their fellow legislators.

headline.seo: Keeping Mum on Race for Texas House Speaker Race
headline.main: When It Comes to Race for House Speaker, Secretiveness Rules
headline.print_headline: When It Comes to Race For House Speaker, Secretiveness Rules
